data.title: Mary Renault: A Biography by David Sweetman
data.meta_description: This outstanding biography of the celebrated historical novelist was a Lambda Literary Award nominee. Photos. (July)...
data.text:
Mary Renault: A Biography

David Sweetman. Harvest Books, $23.95 (348pp) ISBN 978-0-15-600060-4

This outstanding biography of the celebrated historical novelist was a Lambda Literary Award nominee. Photos. (July)
